title: Launcher won't open, just disappears after hitting launch Mac
body: I was updating lol and it suddenly stopped working so I quitted it. When I tried to reopen it wouldn't open, the icon would come up and disappear. I decided I wild reinstall league so I did. All the updates were done, but when I hit launch then launcher just disappeared. I have tried reinstalling it again but it doesn't work. Btw I am on mac ( don't be mad ).

replies.body: Hey, we offer support for Mac!  The patcher not launching can happen if your connection is struggling to reach the patching service.  Start off the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case anything is blocking you along the way, and let me know if that gets you in!
HEY try running lol as admin it helped me once
I just tried to turn of firewall. Nothing changed. Is there anything else I can do.
